title: Monkey
description: Librarian's note: An alternate cover edition can be found hereIt romps down eternity and the universe with a tenderness and pure absondon...enchanting. The translation from beginningto end is exactly right. - New StatesmanMONKEY is a sixteenth-century Chinese novel which combines beauty with absurdity, profundity with nonsense. Folk-lore, allegory, religion, history, anti-bureaucratic satire, and pure poetry are the diverse elements that make up the novel.
author: Wu Cheng'en
